text: @JackPosobiec @KaitMarieox But its being used by the #fakenews and #deepstate to destroy the economy and #Trump. They stoke fear and lie about it. If #Hillary was President #Covid_19 / #coronavirus would be #H1N1. We would barely hear about it. The death tolls would not be inflated. Media is cheering it on
